actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To extend the possession tax credit with respect to American Samoa an additional 10 years.
short_title: American Samoa Possession Tax Credit Act of 2005

summary.text: American Samoa Possession Tax Credit Act of 2005 - Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions to extend the possession tax credit, with respect to American Samoa, until December 31, 2016.

titles.title: American Samoa Possession Tax Credit Act of 2005
To extend the possession tax credit with respect to American Samoa an additional 10 years.
